description.p: 0.8.1 is a bugfix release to fix some issues found after releasing 0.8.0

ul.li: Fix incorrect controls in netplay sometimes
Fix some NAT traversal issues, and add a network configuration menu
Fan made tournament support (still a bit experimental)
Various smaller gameplay and UI fixes

description.p: 0.8.0 is the "feature complete" alpha release of OpenOMF. All major gameplay components are now implemented.

ul.li: Netplay support (peer to peer and via a network lobby)
Reworked text renderer and HELP menu

description.p: Small bugfix release to 0.7.1 that also adds support for Flatpak

ul.li: Fix HAR colors in tournament cutscenes

description.p: The first OpenOMF release in 10 years, it has a tremendous amount of changes, but these are the highlights

ul.li: New graphics renderer with more correct visuals

description.p: OpenOMF is an open-source remake of the 1994 DOS fighting classic One Must Fall 2097.
One Must Fall 2097 is a 2D fighting game set in the year 2097 where pilots use Human Assisted Robots (HARs) to battle in various arenas.
One Must Fall 2097 features a 1 player story mode, a 2 player mode, a tournament mode with RPG elements and network play.
If you experience rendering issues where no text appears, please try flatpak run --env=LIBGL_ALWAYS_SOFTWARE=1 org.openomf.OpenOMF
